line_2: I vow'd obedience, constancy and love,

line_1: Why Crouds and Noise I disapprove;
line_2: O let us to some Cell remove;

line_1: Nor by Reproach, his Passion disapprove,
line_2: But crown his Constancy with lasting Love.

line_1: You Err, in thinking she would disapprove
line_2: The brave Pursuit of honourable Love,

line_1: The Youth whose Passion none could disapprove,
line_2: When Hymen waited to compleat his Love;

line_1: Nor thou my gentle calling disapprove:
line_2: To die is glorious in the bed of love.
But yet I fear, because I love.
But I believe, because I love.
